alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 12:46PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN AITKIN, SOUTHWESTERN CASS AND CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 115 PM CDT... At 1245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Aitkin, to near Brainerd, to near Motley, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Deerwood around 1250 PM CDT. South Long Lake and Upper South Long Lake around 105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mille Lacs Lake, Garrison and Fort Ripley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass
